w:r.w:t: TITLE: Be nice! Rules at School

The teacher will teach rules at school by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases: rules, listen when your teacher is talking, raise your hand to speak or stand, keep your hands and feet to yourself, be safe and be kind, follow directions quickly
n of this lesson, students will be able to:
sets of words in complete sentences
Word List: rules, listen, quickly, safe
This slide will always be the
-branded opener slide that the teacher will display as the student enters the classroom.
Greet your student and introduce the lesson concept: “Today, we are going to be learning about the rules at school!”

Keep your hands and feet to yourself
Try to simply explain that we should not touch other people or kick, but we should keep our hands and feet to ourselves.
